name: my-setup-automation
author: Nir Pisahov
description: My desktop setup automation - Control LED strip and a custom made motorized monitor arm with Raspberry PI

scripts.deploy: npm run build && ssh nirpisahov@10.0.0.34 'mkdir -p ~/actuator-control && rm -rf ~/actuator-control/dist' && scp -r dist package.json .env config nirpisahov@10.0.0.34:~/actuator-control
